author: Al Jazeera
title: Coronavirus terminology explained: Your COVID-19 glossary
description: We explain the jargon surrounding COVID-19 to help you understand the pandemic and how the world seeks to contain it.
content:
For weeks now, news coverage around the world has been dominated by the new coronavirus pandemic, with advice flying around about social distancing, the dangers of COVID-19 and the common interest in flattening the curve.
It is easy to be overwhelmed by all … [+2325 chars]
